_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Stationeer (Vanilla)
author: jeremiejt38@gmail.com
description:
Stationeers Server Vanilla
Official Server Guide : https://stationeers-wiki.com/Dedicated_Server_Guide
startup: stty cols 80 rows 24; wine64 ./rocketstation_DedicatedServer.exe  -LOADLATEST "{{SAVE_NAME}}" {{WORLD_NAME}} -settings ServerName "{{SERVER_NAME}}" StartLocalHost {{START_LOCALHOST}} ServerVisible {{SERVER_VISIBLE}} GamePort {{SERVER_PORT}} UpdatePort {{UPDATE_PORT}} AutoSave {{AUTOSAVE}} SaveInterval {{SAVE_INTERVAL}} ServerPassword {{SERVER_PASSWD}} ServerMaxPlayers {{MAX_PLAYERS}} UPNPEnabled {{UPNP}} AdminPassword {{ADMIN_PASSWD}} ServerAuthSecret {{AUTH_SECRET}} UseSteamP2P {{STEAMP2P}} DisconnectTimeout {{TIMEOUT}} AutoPauseServer {{AUTO_PAUSE}}; 2>&1

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

## License: MIT License
## Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:debian'
echo "####################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################";
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAPASS} ]] || printf %s "-betapassword ${SRCDS_BETAPASS}" ) ${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..." . ${SRCDS_APPID}
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Display server name on server list in-game.

variables.name: Server Visible
variables.description: Starts pining RocketWerkz Master server which will allow the server to show on the server list on the client.

variables.name: Save Name
variables.description:
Name of the save of your world.
Auto save & auto load worlds on server startup.

variables.name: World Name
variables.description: Available Maps: Moon, Mars, Europa, Europa2, Mimas, Vulcan, Vulcan2, Space, Loulan, Venus

variables.name: Admin Password
variables.description: An optional password to lock the server.

variables.name: Server AuthSecret
variables.description: 2nd Admin authentication with a AuthSecret, need to be the same in ur MyDocuments/mygames/Stationeers/settings.xml in ur computer if you using it.

variables.name: Save Interval
variables.description: Sets the server’s auto-save interval in seconds.

variables.name: Start LocalHost
variables.description: Starts the server on the machine allowing any client connection to take place.

variables.name: UPNP
variables.description: Turn on/off Universal Plug and Play connection feature.

variables.name: Disconnect Timeout
variables.description: Timeout before disconnect a player when trying to connect.

variables.name: Beta Branch
variables.description: Enable beta branch for Stationeer Server

variables.name: AUTO_UPDATE
variables.description: Disabling or enabling automated updates on boot

variables.name: Windows Install Flag
variables.description: Required for windows game server installs

variables.name: WINETRICKS_RUN
variables.description: Run installs on software that is required by the server
